titleStmt.title: Die Veneris, 28. Maii 1647. An ordinance for releife of maymed souldiers and marriners, and the vvidows and orphants [sic] of such as have died in the service of the Parliament during these late vvarres
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, Printer to the Honourable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Date appears at head of title.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
